name: Pluto Vs Mercury
description:
Made For the >>Games Factory Jam<< 

Main theme >>SOLAR SYSTEM<<

Theme 2 >>TWO BUTTON CONTROLS<<

Theme 3 >>PUZZLE<<

Story:

In 2006, Pluto was demoted from a planet, to Dwarf planet
...

Pluto, being the timid planet she was, didn't mind. 
Up until the other planets started to mock her
...

Eventually, in 20@# Pluto snapped, and wanted,
REVENGE
...

She sought out her original mocker,
MERCURY
...
